result.execSummary:
The defendant Marlaina Jean Tibbetts was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Business Setting <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must comply with rules of supervision.

16CM160 - Counts 1 & 2
16CF71 - Counts 1, 11, 13, 15, 17, 25 & 27
16CF125 - Counts 2, 6 & 7
Consecutive to: 16CF125 - Count 1

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to Probation while on Probation.
$200.00 DNA surcharge to be paid to Probation while on Probation.

Absolute Sobriety.  
No Contacts to be determined by Department of Corrections.
Must complete an AODA assessment & comply with recommendations.

timeConds.notes: Must complete 10 hours of Community Service during each year of Probation for a total of 30 hours.

No contacts to be left up to DOC.
